While achieving Perfection in Heart of Woods didn’t necessarily mean that the Sunlight Absorption Super-Rank Skill would manifest, there was no doubt he had taken the most important step.
A terrible majesty emanated from that figure.
Wolf King Majesty!
This was monarch-level majesty, and now, with Old Sha’s own Level having advanced to this stage, Wolf King Majesty truly lived up to its name.
Majesty of a King, this Skill, truly wasn’t something an ordinary person could possess.
Su Ping had previously speculated that Old Sha had once had an unimaginable unique encounter. In that encounter, its Sunlight Absorption Skill reached Perfection, breaking through its race limit. In the process, it also obtained this extremely special Skill, ’Wolf King Majesty’.
Previously, Su Ping hadn’t paid it much mind. But now that Old Sha had advanced to Monarch, Wolf King Majesty was finally unleashed in its entirety.
San Ha, the Elf Wolf, was whimpering softly, as if worshipping its king. At the same time, countless Plant-based Pet Beasts around them, after this peculiar Wolf King’s promotion, could feel the surging vitality emanating from it. It was as if Old Sha were one of their own, making them instinctively want to draw near and approach it.
About ten minutes passed. Old Sha reopened its eyes, having already reverted to its beast form. The light gradually faded. When Old Sha reappeared, there were no particularly special changes.
Perhaps the Y-shaped horns on its head had become a more vibrant green, and the forest-like branches and leaves on its body more dense.
But Su Ping could see from the Eye of Truth’s feedback that Old Sha was now a solid First Stage Monarch. This proved it had succeeded.
This old Forest Wolf, merely a Commander First Stage half a year ago, had completed its most magnificent metamorphosis in this half-year period. In just half a year, it had risen to Monarch Level!
The difference between the Monarch Level and the Commander Level was like heaven and earth. This was evident in the difficulty for a Beast Tamer to rise from Commander to Monarch—it was extremely high. Pet Beasts possessed the Ability of Evolution, so in many cases, it wasn’t too much of a concern. However, promotion wasn’t something that could be achieved casually either. To Su Ping’s surprise, Old Sha had indeed ’casually’ completed its advancement. A difference of one Realm, yet the disparity was enormous.
And now, his Heart of Woods endeavor finally possessed its own Monarch Level combat power!
Although, given his connections and status in Linzhou, it was unlikely anyone lacking judgment would come looking for trouble. However, in this era of extraordinary Controlling Beasts, nothing was more reliable than genuine, tangible strength.
Indeed, good deeds do pay off.
Although Su Ping also knew this was Old Sha’s own accumulation, that Old Sha itself had trained to a critical point. However, without such an opportunity, it might still have required some more time.
At this time, Su Ping truly didn’t have the spare attention to continue observing the Life Ancient Tree’s situation; all his thoughts were on Old Sha. The sunlight returned to normal. Old Sha didn’t continue to absorb sunlight, converting it into the Energy of Heart of Woods, and transferring it to the Life Ancient Tree.
Su Ping could see that, for now, there was nothing abnormal about Old Sha. However, he wasn’t anxious; this wasn’t the place for investigation anyway.
Su Ping exhaled slowly.
Moreover, back then, Er Zhuang was able to unleash such terrifying power because of the complete consistency of those three Skills. There was also another condition that Old Sha lacked: mastering the Skill ’Blinding Technique’. This Skill was the Wanmu Wolf’s method for absorbing and utilizing sunlight. It was also preliminary proof of mastering Light Power. As a Racial Skill of the Wanmu Wolf, mastering this Skill wasn’t considered troublesome. It could even be mastered during natural growth and improvement, but Su Ping felt he couldn’t wait that long.

chapters.title: Chapter 315 - 178 Monarch Old Sha! The Great Harvest of the Plant Catalog!_2
chapters.content:
Chapter 315: Chapter 178 Monarch Old Sha! The Great Harvest of the Plant Catalog!_2
He was no longer a novice in Pet Beast cultivation. He had already acquired his own insights into the cultivation of Pet Beasts.
Mastery of such skills fell under the Wanmu Wolf’s Racial Skills; corresponding resources could be used to accelerate its growth.
As for the Blinding Technique, it was an energy release of sunlight power. Therefore, by replenishing solar energy to a certain limit, one would naturally comprehend it.
Thinking of this, Su Ping obviously didn’t want to stay here any longer. He spoke to Dong Muyun, who was beside him, saying,
"After we go back, prepare a large quantity of Sunspring Water for me."
He still had some Sun Crystals in his possession, scrounged from the legion. The Breeder Association had also given him two more, so he definitely wasn’t lacking in them.
Dong Muyun gave him a somewhat surprised look but did not ask anything.
At this moment, Su Ping represented miracles themselves.
Because not only him, but everyone around—even the Life Ancient Tree itself—had never expected that it could possibly regain vitality one day.
Even if such vitality only extended its life a little.
However, this was the release of someone else’s skills, not the consumption of precious resources.
If possible, was there really a chance to continue living?
Even a lowly insect clings to life. Being resigned to death does not mean one desires it.
If there was a chance to continue living, what living being would want to die without reason?
Without a doubt, the Life Ancient Tree felt the same. It silently observed the Old Wolf still experiencing a surge of power and the Beast Tamer who had lowered his head, lost in contemplation. Eventually, the face on its bark finally spoke:
"Little fellow, what kind of Pet Beast is this?"
Su Ping then came back to his senses and smiled.
"The Wanmu Wolf. Heart of Woods... it’s one of the family members from my cultivation base."
"Family..."
The Old Tree chewed on these words and then smiled faintly. "Little fellow, may I visit your home? If you don’t mind the short time I have left."
Su Ping smiled broadly.
"Of course, don’t worry. With me here, I definitely won’t let you die so easily."
The Old Tree hadn’t really believed these words before. It knew its own condition better than anyone else. Whether it could continue to live was unclear.
But it had to be said, this strange tree wolf was just too bizarre.
The Beast Tamer who had cultivated such an odd Pet Beast was undoubtedly even more extraordinary.
Just as the Old Tree had previously mused, only under the care of human Beast Tamers would such odd, yet marvelously magical, Pet Beasts be born and come into existence.
So, it was willing to believe in this little fellow.
Xu Li and the others looked on with complex expressions.
This time, they were truly convinced.
They wished they could thump their chests with such certainty and take this old Life Ancient Tree away too.
If they could take it, not to mention the numerous low-level, mass-produced varieties of plant-based Pet Beasts, acquiring the surrounding rare and valuable plant-based Pet Beasts would certainly be no problem.
If they could take all of them back to Fire King Company, it would undoubtedly represent an unimaginable wealth.
But how could they make such a promise?
During the ’fishing’—when Xu Li had been subtly probing—he had heard some things about the background and miraculous deeds of the young owner of Heart of Woods.
But he had never seen it with his own eyes.
And now, he had finally witnessed it.
It was no wonder such a young person was held in such high regard by Queen Dong and Presidents Qin Liu. Impressive indeed.
However, neither Fire King Company nor Xu Li himself had much of a relationship with this young man. Otherwise, establishing a good relationship with him would undoubtedly bring all benefits and no drawbacks.
Suddenly, an idea flashed through Xu Li’s mind.
He recalled someone from the company mentioning that among this year’s interns at Fire King Company, there seemed to be a classmate of this young owner—the same lad who had come along to do menial tasks on this trip.
Could he perhaps foster a closer connection through this contact?
While Xu Li from Fire King Company was still mulling things over, he saw that the Life Ancient Tree had agreed to relocate. The other plant-based Pet Beasts, which were to accompany it to Su Ping’s cultivation base, had already gathered around again.
They began chattering again with renewed vigor:
"RUSTLE RUSTLE! (Tree Grandfather, how are you doing?)"
"BLUB BLUB BLUB! (Life Ancient Tree, Your life force...)"
"[...]"
Su Ping also looked towards the Life Ancient Tree. He could naturally see its condition as well.
The problem with the Life Ancient Tree was not resolved.
The decayed roots within its body were still not showing any signs of improvement.
However, quite a few of the withered branches and leaves within the canopy had been restored.
Although it was still only a temporary solution, not addressing the root cause, the restored vitality had nourished it considerably. Thus, it could extend its lifespan for a while longer.
Indeed, as expected, the Life Ancient Tree continued with a slight smile,
"Thank you to this human Beast Tamer’s Pet Beast. I might be able to live about five more months."
An extension of half a year was indeed not much.
But one must realize, this was only after a single treatment by Old Sha.
Upon hearing this, the other plant-based Pet Beasts couldn’t help but rustle as they turned their gaze towards Su Ping.
Nearby, Rouge Powder Peach Blossom Smile made a sound,
"RUSTLE RUSTLE! (It’s... him. His name is Su Ping. Lord Peach Blossom knows him...)"
Obviously.
Most of the other plant-based Pet Beasts had witnessed Su Ping winning Lord Peach Blossom’s ’affection’ on the hillside earlier.
And now that Su Ping had once again helped treat their Life Ancient Tree, there was no doubt. At this very moment, all the sentient, rare plant-based Pet Beasts regarded Su Ping with a ’gaze’ that was vastly different.
Then, as expected, the Longevity Banyan, whose huge branch canopy was closest, rustled as it spoke,
"RUSTLE RUSTLE! (Human, you were able to help the Life Ancient Tree, and since the Life Ancient Tree is willing to leave with you, I’m also willing to go with you.)"
The Longevity Banyan’s stance did not surprise anyone; in fact, it was entirely expected.
However, what also didn’t surprise anyone was the Life Ancient Tree’s unimaginable rallying power.
Following the Longevity Banyan, the towering King Gunpine, its form reaching into the clouds, also made its voice heard,
"RUSTLE RUSTLE! (I will always follow the Life Ancient Tree...)"
"BLUB BLUB BLUB! (Wherever the Life Ancient Tree goes, I will go. Thank you, human Beast Tamer...)"
"..."
"RUSTLE RUSTLE! (Right! Lord Peach Blossom... indeed saw at first glance that Su Ping could help the Life Ancient Tree! That’s... that’s why I wanted to go!)"
Amidst the chorus of voices, Rouge Powder Peach Blossom Smile chimed in, adding its own reason for having ’surrendered’ so early.
Su Ping chuckled, not minding.
However, what happened next was something he couldn’t just ignore.
Because at that moment, his Myriad Spirit Beast Atlas, which had just quieted down, suddenly and swiftly unfurled once more from within his soul.
Yes, incredibly swiftly!
Page after page of the Catalog appeared in the depths of Su Ping’s mind.
If illuminating a Catalog page before was like drawing a single card, then this time, it was akin to performing a ten-pull!
The Catalog pages unfurling from deep within his soul were so numerous it was dazzling.
[Catalog ’Longevity Banyan’ illuminated, Current Level: 1. Origin Reward: Talent ’Telepathic Communication’ effect enhancement (2/10)!]
[Catalog ’King Gunpine’ illuminated, Current Level: 1. Origin Reward: Talent ’Telepathic Communication’ effect enhancement (3/10)!]
[Catalog ’Laurel Tree’ illuminated, Current Level: 1. Origin Reward: Talent ’Telepathic Communication’ effect enhancement (4/10)!]
[...]
[Catalog ’Flame Morning Glory’ illuminated, Current Level: 1. Origin Reward: Talent ’Call for Rain’!]
[Catalog ’Sky-reaching Vine’ illuminated, Current Level: 1. Origin Reward: Talent ’Call for Rain’ effect enhancement (1/20)!]

chapters.title: Chapter 316 - 179: Talent Upgrade Successful! Sky-reaching Vine!
chapters.content:
Chapter 316: Chapter 179: Talent Upgrade Successful! Sky-reaching Vine!
Was it really a ten-pull summon?
Su Ping blinked. This time, he even felt a headache coming on.
This was because the intimacy levels with the plant-type Pet Beasts whose Catalogs were being illuminated had reached the standard.
The illuminated Catalog affected his Spirit directly.
His Telepathic Communication Talent was enhanced, and he gained the new Talent ’Rain Prayer’. Such rapid improvement made it somewhat difficult for Su Ping to accept.
Of course, difficulty in accepting it didn’t mean he was unwilling to accept it.
If a mere headache could grant such improvement, then Su Ping would say, please continue, whip me harder.
He rubbed his throbbing temples, yet still felt a tinge of unsatisfaction.
What a pity.
Those Low-level Pet Beasts below Commander Level, being plant-type Pet Beasts, did not possess strong intelligence or understanding. They only followed passively and naturally couldn’t quite grasp what was happening.
Therefore, the difficulty in illuminating those Pet Beasts’ Catalogs was likely to be much more challenging than for the others.
However, Su Ping was satisfied.
Because at this very moment, he had not only acquired the brand-new Talent ’Rain Prayer.’
While these plant-type Catalogs were being illuminated, his ’Telepathic Communication’ Talent indeed reached its full potential.
It must be said, thanks are due to the Life Ancient Tree.
It was not just because of these Life Ancient Trees that a Catalog could be illuminated.
More importantly, there was a special notification from the Myriad Spirit Beast Atlas:
[Catalog ’Life Ancient Tree’ illuminated, Current Level: 1, received Origin reward: Talent ’Telepathic Communication’ effect increased (11/10)!]
[Talent ’Telepathic Communication’ upgraded to ’Psychic Communication’]
Compared to the illumination of other Catalogs, I wonder if it’s because of the Life Ancient Tree’s higher race Level that it directly resulted in a three-point increase in effect!
It was precisely because of this that after the Catalogs of ten plant-type Pet Beasts were illuminated, his Telepathic Communication Talent reached its full potential!
Su Ping closed his eyes, sensing the Origin feedback from the Myriad Spirit Beast Atlas:
[Rain Prayer: Can use spiritual power to cause localized rainfall! Moistens plant-type Pet Beasts, and at the same time, amplifies the concentration of Water Element.]
Hmm?
Su Ping’s eyes lit up.
Though it was somewhat abstract to receive such a Water Element Talent from illuminating the Catalog of a clearly Fire Element Pet Beast like the Flame Morning Glory.
But it had to be said, this Talent was truly useful.
Moreover, it was critical in battle.
Even though he didn’t have any Water Element Pet Beasts.
Thinking of this, Su Ping fell silent.
Thinking of those cute plant-type Pet Beasts and then those damn annoying silverfin fish, Su Ping became infuriated.
He decided to refocus his attention on the change in another Talent!
The elevation in Talent Level was something Su Ping had wanted to understand for a while.
But he never had the chance.
And such information was not taught at basic Beast Tamer schools either.
Now, with the help of the Myriad Spirit Beast Atlas, he had finally completed this Talent Skill upgrade.
[Psychic Communication: Can use the power of the Spirit to fully understand others’ intentions, and without speaking out loud, allow other Living Beings to hear one’s voice! It also has a certain bewitching effect.]
It was still very plain; even fundamentally, there wasn’t much change in the Talent upgrade.
If it weren’t for that last sentence, there might hardly be any change.
At best, an additional ’sound transmission’ effect was added.
Although, this effect was also quite significant.
Su Ping’s registered Talent was ’Pet Beast Home’; he didn’t inherently possess Telepathic Communication.
Often, when he rushed to communicate with his Pet Beasts, it was indeed easy to give away his position. Silent communication would indeed save him from a lot of trouble.
But that explanation at the end added quite a bit of color to this Psychic Communication.
Of course, Su Ping absolutely did not approve of the term ’bewitching.’
For a righteous Breeder, isn’t educating and influencing far superior to bewitching?
It seemed as if his thoughts had willed it; the final word in the Myriad Spirit Beast Atlas’s feedback for the Psychic Communication Talent actually changed to ’influencing.’
This finally made Su Ping nod in satisfaction.
Very good.
The effect of the Talent upgrade is excellent!
Such improvement was exactly what could truly bring out a Beast Tamer’s Talented Ability.
It just remained to be seen if the enhancement effect of Telepathic Communication was like this, then what about the other Talents, like the most versatile Eye of Truth?
By the way, why did all the Talents enhanced in these plant-type Catalogs turn out to be Telepathic Communication?
What he really wanted to enhance was indeed the Eye of Truth.
The Ability of the Eye of Truth was too universal.
Nevertheless, Su Ping reopened his eyes. He instinctively glanced over, confirming with each illuminated Catalog one by one.
But soon, Su Ping was slightly startled again.
The Flame Morning Glory and King Gunpine were naturally present.
The others, like the Laurel Tree and the Blade Ginkgo, which were relatively silent, were all there.
But, he looked all over the hillside and couldn’t spot the Sky-reaching Vine that was the last to be illuminated in the Catalog.
In the Catalog, this was a very common vine.
Lush green, at first glance, it even looked a bit like the ’Vine Strangling’ Skill summoned by the Forest Wolf.
But its body was extremely long.
It belonged to the same category as extremely rare Pet Beasts.
However, if such a special vine Pet Beast were present here, Su Ping should have seen it.

chapters.title: Chapter 317 - 179: Talent Upgrade Successful! Sky-reaching Vine!_2
chapters.content:
Chapter 317: Chapter 179: Talent Upgrade Successful! Sky-reaching Vine!_2
He shook his head and paid it no mind.
Opening his sparkling eyes, he looked at the Life Ancient Tree and all the beings present with a smile:
"So, seniors, when do you plan to depart?"
He had to get them secured.
Without moving them to his own place, Su Ping couldn’t feel at ease.
The Life Ancient Tree naturally understood this and chuckled, "I brought them here because I’m ready to leave. There’s nothing more to prepare; we can go at any time!"
Dong Muyun’s eyes also brightened. "I’ll send someone to drive over right away!"
The plant-based Pet Beasts before them were of such a high level that they couldn’t be stored in the Beast Taming Space. Transporting wild Pet Beasts had always been a hassle. Ordinary spatial storage couldn’t hold living Pet Beasts. In this respect, one could see that Su Ping’s Pet Beast Home Talent wasn’t bad at all. Unfortunately, its Level wasn’t high enough.
Other matters were easier to handle. Su Ping looked at the King Gunpine and the Longevity Banyan. The Longevity Banyan’s canopy spanned over a hundred meters, forming a forest by itself. He scratched his head. Fortunately, it turned out Su Ping didn’t understand them well enough. The Longevity Banyan’s body could actually be split apart, and the slender King Gunpine could shrink down to just twenty or thirty meters. Pet Beasts capable of reaching Commander-Level Peak indeed possessed abilities beyond ordinary Pet Beasts.
While Dong Muyun went aside to make arrangements, Xu Li thought for a moment, then walked over with a helpless expression, saying, "Su Ping, can we discuss this? Could you spare some of the plant-based Pet Beasts?"
Xu Li felt truly helpless.
He had anticipated this kid’s cunning, but he hadn’t expected it to reach this extent. Although he hadn’t truly expected to win the competition for the plant-based Pet Beasts, he hadn’t foreseen such an outcome.
All the high-end, rare plant-based Pet Beasts were taken by this brat? Then why the hell did our Fire King Company spend so much money to buy this huge piece of land?
Now, the development trends at the Beast Master Association were shifting again, and they hadn’t managed to acquire any plant-based Pet Beasts. This business venture was a total loss, a complete write-off. At this point, he could only approach Su Ping and try to negotiate, to see if anything could be salvaged.
Unfortunately, Su Ping shook his head. "Mr. Xu, as you can see, it’s not that I don’t want to help you. These Pet Beasts appear to be coming with me, but it’s actually out of respect for the Life Ancient Tree. How can I help you? We can’t just force them away, can we?"
That was indeed true.
So many plant-based Pet Beasts... Although raising them would incur costs, the value of plant-based Pet Beasts lay in their extremely low breeding costs compared to other Pet Beasts. This made them incredibly cost-effective. The sheer number of these Pet Beasts represented an unimaginable value. Unless he, Xu Li, was Su Ping’s most favored son, there was no way Su Ping would agree.
"Sigh..." Xu Li sighed.
He knew it wasn’t just about the rare plant-based Pet Beasts on the hillside. Even obtaining the ordinary, Elite Level ones below would likely be difficult. Once the Life Ancient Tree spoke, those Pet Beasts would undoubtedly leave obediently with it.
Around a thousand plant-based Pet Beasts!
Although these low-level plant-based Pet Beasts were mostly of common, repetitive species, their variety was still excellent! Those willing to accompany the Life Ancient Tree were primarily plant-based Pet Beasts that weren’t aggressive and weren’t skilled in combat. Such Pet Beasts usually shared a common trait: most of them possessed agricultural value. For example, they could produce resources—their fruits, leaves, or even branches all had various useful effects. For a company, these types were the most precious.
What a pity.
Xu Li shot Su Ping a resentful glance. Just then, the Life Ancient Tree, having overheard their conversation, chuckled. "In this vast forest farm, there are still some ’children’ who don’t wish to be with me. Among them is a rather naughty and rebellious one. You can try to find it; you might be able to take some from the forest farm with its permission."
Xu Li’s eyes lit up slightly. He bowed to the Monarch Peak Life Ancient Tree.
Although searching Bullhorn Mountain within the forest farm would be quite arduous, it was far better than returning empty-handed.
Su Ping, however, was slightly taken aback. "Elder Life Ancient Tree, is there another Advanced Pet Beast in this forest farm?"
The Life Ancient Tree nodded, then sighed like an elderly human. "That child is stubborn. It always felt I no longer needed to protect them and even wanted to protect us. It’s also the only little one who knew of my condition, which is why it was unwilling to come with me. It wanted to stay here, to accompany me and protect the other young ones."
Hearing the Life Ancient Tree’s words, Su Ping couldn’t help but picture a headstrong young one—appearing rebellious and dismissive of protection, yet deeply caring for its family and secretly wanting to shield them all. Although Pet Beasts were plant lifeforms, once they developed emotional intelligence and self-awareness, they became increasingly similar to humans.
So, Su Ping smiled. But soon after, he was suddenly taken aback. "Elder, the one you’re referring to... could it be the Sky-reaching Vine?"
That was the only Pet Beast listed in the Catalog that he hadn’t seen on the hillside. However, for it to be aware of the situation here, it was very likely a Commander Level or higher Pet Beast.
